attributes.action: ACCEPT THAT CAR OWNERSHIP IS ESSENTUAL FOR MANY AND REDUCE TAXATION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That we have had enough of this government over taxing and persecuting the motorist,we are paying far to much taxation and enough is enough,also the prime minister and ministers should lead by example and comute on buses.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
